summary: Comprehensive testing of gym workout tracking app. All backend APIs (17/17) pass. Frontend UI is fully functional with correct orange accent color, text capitalization, collapsible cards, exercise checklist, edit dialog, and workout completion flow.

ui_bugs.issue: Storico nav button click intercepted by Emergent badge overlay - works with JS click
ui_bugs.note: Known environment issue from iteration_1, not a code bug. Users can access /history directly or via dashboard history section.

passed_tests: Backend: Root API endpoint returns 200
Backend: GET /api/workout-plans returns 3 plans
Backend: All plans have correct structure (day_number, name, exercises)
Backend: Plans ordered by day_number (1, 2, 3)
Backend: All 3 days have 'Addominali' exercise with 'Corpo libero' load
Backend: Individual workout plan retrieval (days 1, 2, 3)
Backend: Non-existent plan returns 404
Backend: PUT /api/workout-plans/{day}/exercises/{exId} updates exercise name permanently
Backend: PUT /api/workout-plans/{day}/exercises/{exId}/load updates load
Backend: Non-existent exercise update returns 404
Backend: POST /api/exercise-logs creates and returns log
Backend: GET /api/exercise-logs/{exId} retrieves logs
Backend: POST /api/workout-sessions creates session with report
Backend: Report includes total_volume, completed_exercises, load_changes
Backend: GET /api/workout-sessions returns all sessions
Backend: GET /api/workout-sessions/{id} returns individual session
Backend: GET /api/next-workout returns correct next day
Backend: POST /api/seed reseeds database
Frontend: Dashboard loads with 3 workout day cards
Frontend: Giorno 1 expanded (next), Giorno 2+3 collapsed by default
Frontend: Collapsible cards expand/collapse on header click
Frontend: Theme toggle switches between dark and light mode
Frontend: Accent color is orange (HSL hue 25, RGB 245,138,61) in both themes
Frontend: 'Inizia Allenamento' navigates to /workout/{day}
Frontend: Exercise checklist checkboxes toggle completion
Frontend: Progress bar updates as exercises are checked
Frontend: Completed exercises show strikethrough
Frontend: Edit button opens EditExerciseDialog
Frontend: Edit dialog has name, sets, reps, load fields
Frontend: 'Salva Definitivamente' switch toggles between permanent/session save
Frontend: Clicking exercise opens ExerciseDetailSheet
Frontend: Detail sheet shows current load and update input
Frontend: CompleteWorkoutSheet shows volume estimation
Frontend: Duration input works
Frontend: Saving workout shows report (duration, volume, exercises)
Frontend: 'Torna Alla Dashboard' returns to /
Frontend: Dashboard 'Storico Recente' section shows history items
Frontend: Clicking history item navigates to /history/{id}
Frontend: HistoryDetail shows stats (duration, volume, exercises)
Frontend: HistoryDetail back button navigates to / (dashboard)
Frontend: History page accessible at /history
Frontend: Text capitalization applied (exercise names, headings)
Frontend: Addominali shows 'â€”' for Corpo libero load
seed_data_creation: Used existing seed data via /api/seed endpoint
context_for_next_testing_agent: App fully functional. Backend has 17 pytest tests covering all endpoints. Frontend tested on 430x932 mobile viewport. Key features verified: 3-day workout cards with collapsible behavior, orange accent color (not pink), exercise checklist, edit dialog with permanent/session save toggle, exercise detail sheet with load chart, workout completion with report, history section on dashboard. Known environment issue: Emergent badge overlay intercepts clicks on bottom nav Storico button.
